mapper.select:
select
from v_stat_teacher_student
nf >= #{startYear} AND nf <= #{endYear}
order by nf ASC

SELECT SUM(bdrs) AS rs FROM v_stat_teacher_student AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgbh = b.jgbh AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear} AND a.JGBH is not null

SELECT ANY_VALUE(b.jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(b.jgmc) AS jgmc, SUM(bdrs) AS rs FROM v_stat_teacher_student AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgbh=b.jgbh AND nf = #{query.endYear} AND b.jgbh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY b.jgbh ORDER BY rs DESC

SELECT SUM(sdrs) AS rs FROM v_stat_teacher_student AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgbh = b.jgbh AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear} AND a.JGBH is not null

SELECT ANY_VALUE(b.jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(b.jgmc) AS jgmc, SUM(sdrs) AS rs FROM v_stat_teacher_student AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgbh=b.jgbh and nf = #{query.endYear} AND b.jgbh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY jgbh ORDER BY rs DESC
